last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter Six: TV…Or Not TV
last_episode_to_air.overview: Xbox loses its way. Can a former intern get the team back on track?

name: Power On: The Story of Xbox
original_name: Power On: The Story of Xbox
overview: Xbox almost didn't happen. Find out why in this behind-the-scenes, six-part series that takes you back to the scrappy beginnings of Microsoft's video game console. It's the untold story of the people behind the box, glitches and all.
tagline: Four gamers. One idea. And a billion dollar bet.

episodes.name: Chapter One: The Renegades
episodes.overview: A small team of upstarts sets out to convince Microsoft that it’s time to enter the console business.

episodes.name: Chapter Two: The Valentine’s Day Massacre
episodes.overview: The battle to own the living room is on–but not without significant cost and risk.

episodes.name: Chapter Three: And It Didn’t Turn On
episodes.overview: Public doubt intensifies as issues threaten to spoil the 2001 launch for Xbox.

episodes.name: Chapter Four: Cool…Now What?
episodes.overview: A console is only as good as its games… and Xbox needs a gamechanger to survive. Enter Halo.

episodes.name: Chapter Five: Red Ring of Death
episodes.overview: The demand for Xbox 360 is at fever pitch, but a critical malfunction threatens its success.

episodes.name: Chapter Six: TV…Or Not TV
episodes.overview: Xbox loses its way. Can a former intern get the team back on track?
